channel.title: Compiler problems
channel.description:
Hi, I'm a new member and I don't really know how to code an RSPS; But my friend showed me how to make a compiler and it says "javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options press any key to continue . . ."
This is my compiler code; @echo off COLOR 0A title Runescape Private Server Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_17\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Guys really?
File not found means it can’t find any java files lol.
change the directory where it’s searching for em.
. .java
^That should usually be: ./.java or just *.java

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @jkicool jkicool
item.description:
@jkicool wrote:

Make sure that you have the correct file path for the jdk to work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @ljay_wilson ljay wilson
item.description:
@ljay_wilson wrote:

Remove - cp, and if that dont work, Check to make sure that is the Java you have, Make sure you have JAva Development Kit as well buddy,

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @Kamran1 Kamran1
item.description:
@Kamran1 wrote:

[quote=“skyisover, post:1, topic:515831”]Hi, I’m a new member and I don’t really know how to code an RSPS;
But my friend showed me how to make a compiler and it says
“javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue . . .”

This is my compiler code;
@echo off
COLOR 0A
title Runescape Private Server Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause[/quote]

Take off -cp .

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Do you actually have jdk 7u17?

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler problems

item.description:
@skyisover wrote:

Hi, I’m a new member and I don’t really know how to code an RSPS;
But my friend showed me how to make a compiler and it says
“javac: file not found: *.java
Usage: javac
use -help for a list of possible options
press any key to continue . . .”

This is my compiler code;
@echo off
COLOR 0A
title Runescape Private Server Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_17\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause
